trans-unit.source: Determines the alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina o alinhamento de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the left or top end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> deve ser ancorado até a parte final superior ou esquerda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, dependendo da orientação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" /> are aligned to the right side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> for <see langword="Yes" />, itens marcados como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" /> serão alinhados do lado direito do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the right or bottom end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> deve ser ancorado até a parte final inferior ou direita do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, dependendo da orientação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> are aligned to the left side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> for <see langword="Yes" />, itens marcados como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> serão alinhados do lado esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
